name: Trick Box
text: If a face-up "Performage" monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect and sent to the Graveyard: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; take control of it until the End Phase, then Special Summon 1 "Performage" monster from your Graveyard to your opponent's field. During the End Phase of this turn, give control of the monster Special Summoned by this effect to its owner.
